title: Feature Request: Add support for OIDC and/or LDAP
body:
Certain users prefer using external authentication solutions in order to maintain separation of concerns and/or add extra security such as 2FA, integration with OIDC or LDAP (I personally prefer OIDC) would archive this goal.
Thank you for your consideration.
author: TheRedCyclops

comments.body: I will definitely consider this as the system evolves.

title: Feature request: Hash and salt passwords
body:
In order to improve the security it would be a great feature if passwords could be stored as a hash instead of plaintext, a salt should also be added to prevent precomputation attacks.
Thank you for your consideration.
author: TheRedCyclops

comments.body: I will definitely consider this as the system evolves with a robust foundation.

title: Last workflow opened got deleted after the installation of nexus
body: Hi, after the installation of nexus, the last workflow active / opened got deleted and its impossible to recover it with an exportation ( it's created a json with a blank workflow )
author: BenDes21

comments.body: Please read the updated readme and also update to new version.

title: Add Flux 1 dev and Flux ControlNets
body:
Hi @daxcay , 

would it be possible to add Flux as well as flux controllers to your collab setup. 

Thank you very much!
author: clemenslindner

comments.body:
Hey, in your Host machine, you can add flux models as well as it's controlnets, and use as you would normally use. 

If your Host Machine has enough vram and can support Flux and it's models then it can run anywhere you use the client's multiplayer comfyui. 

Nexus custom nodes only adds the "multiplayer" support, the working is same as usual Comfyui.

If you face any bugs related to nexus's multiplayer feature not being able to run flux or so, you can report it here.
Huge Fix!! Thank you done ðŸ˜‚
